name: Fairy Tale Pumpkin Fine Art Digital Download Fairy Poem Printable Art
description:
"Such a tiny little pumpkin, I hold it in my hand. Quite sure the Fairies would notice, if I took it from their land." ~A poem quote by  ི♥ྀTricia The Fairy Godmother ི♥ྀ . This fairy tale photo art would look very sweet in a little girl's room.

PRINTABLE ART.
WATERMARK WILL BE REMOVED in the file you receive.

You will receive 1 high resolution digital JPEG (.jpg) file: Upon purchase, this digital image will be sent to your email within 1-48 hours. 

Approx. 4608x3456 pixel resolution file suitable for printing up to 8.5 x 11" (or larger!), or resize it smaller as you wish. Frame it and give as a gift, or print for your own wall or mantle.

NOTE: Digital File/s only. No shipping. You will receive this item electronically. 

TERMS OF USE: You may use this digital art for personal projects, printables, digital applications, personal crafts, and gifts, but Not for commercial use (commercial use is at a higher price, upon request). You may NOT redistribute or sell or give away these files via email, facebook, blogs, flickr, etc., or other digital/electronic means. You are Not permitted to use in print on demand services to create items for sale (unless you purchase the commercial version). May be reused/reprinted multiple times, within the terms of usage.

COMMERCIAL USE: If you would like to use for commercial purposes (such as making a craft for sale), please request commercial pricing. Must be altered in a way that makes it unique from original.

No changes may be made on Instant Download files. 
No returns, refunds or exchanges.

*COLOR NOTE: Each computer and electronic device may be calibrated differently, so please note that colors displayed on your viewing screen may vary from final print.*

COPYRIGHT: All Rights Reserved.

Castles N Crowns "Nurturing Imaginations Through Pretend Play and Art".(tm)

name: WANDS Handcrafted Wooden Wizard Wands Fairy-Princess Wands Wishing Wands Magic Wands FREE GIFT WRAP
description:
WANDS Handcrafted Wooden Wizard Wands, Fairy Wands, Wishing Wands, Magic Wands, Princess Wands, Elven Wands.

COLORS WILL VARY. 

With a '"swish and flick" of your unique wand, your imagination transports you to a magical place! UNIQUE GIFT WRAP included, Free! ~MADE IN USA~

Our delicate handcrafted wooden wands are handmade for Castles N Crowns by a wonderful wand designer in the USA. Wizard Wands, Wishing Wands, Fairy Wands, Elven wands, Magic Wands, Princess Wands, are for fantasy fun, Halloween costume accessories, photo props, or for imaginative pretend play. 

Custom made for Castles N Crowns: Each wand is different, unique, one-of-a-kind and no wand is ever exactly the same!

These make wonderful props, costume accessories, or elven hair sticks (wear in your hair).

SIZE: Wands measure about 9 1/4" and have natural wooden ends. (no glass or attached parts).

AGES: Breakable. Recommended Ages 4 to Adult. (Wand is delicate and must be cared for carefully. See "Basic care of your magical object" below).

COLORS: We requested these beautiful colors just for our customers! Colors may appear slightly different, depending on your viewing screen.

GIFT WRAPPED: Your wand will arrive wrapped in soft tissue and placed inside a custom crafted decorative gift tube with tie and tag, made by our wand designer with love and pixie dust!

***Basic care of your magical object! ~
~"Be safe! Never poke another living someone with your wand."
~"Be aware of your surroundings when flourishing your wand or casting a complex spell."
~"Keep wand in a safe dry place. Water can corrupt the wand’s finish, and fire can certainly burn it."
~"If you bend it, it will splinter or break, take care not to sit on it or keep it in pockets."
~"Treat it as the magical object it is, be safe and have fun!" ~from our Wand Designer: Catherine Earthen Jewels.

WARNING: CAUTION: BREAKABLE -- Not for very young children nor for rough play. This item will break if not careful. Use with care. ***Read the "Basic Care of Your Magical Object", above***. (Assurance from our designer: "Hundreds of children" are using these wands right now! So, with care, they do last and last!)

NON-RETURNABLE: This is a non-refundable, non-returnable, unique, One-of-a-Kind item, custom-made for Castles N Crowns. 

(Not just for Harry Potter fans, though these unique and amazing wands do remind us of a visit to Olivanders Wand Shop, and would make a wonderful gift for any Hogwarts followers. Fans of Lord of the Rings? Elves? Elven fans might think one of these delicate wands makes a wonderful hair decoration).

ALL PHOTOS COPYRIGHT (C) CastlesNcrowns.net

Wand Design Copyright (c) Earthen Jewels. (c) Swish and Flick.

ON SALE!

name: Girls Size 5 Designer "Boo!" Halloween Dress COTTON Made in USA
description:
Boo!!!! Apron knot dress - European Styling - Made in USA

This One-of-a-Kind Apron Knot Dress is very easy to adjust and to wear.

This little apron dress will just delight your Halloween/Fall princess! She can wear with tights or leggings and her own top underneath (not included).

Material: 100% Cotton. Machine Washable. Fabric is pre-washed.

Size: 5 -- Dress length 19.5 inches from armpit to bottom hem (approx. knee length). Chest Approx: 25 inches SLIM.

This is a One-of-a-Kind specially made Designer dress. 

Special Price! {On Sale Now} Regular Boutique Price: $58!

Photos (c) Used with Permission.

AVAILABILITY: 1 IN STOCK

name: Childrens Picture Book A FAIRYTALE TEA PARTY 8x8 Hardcover
description:
A whimsical tale of a twinkling night leading up to a sweet day. Babette the Master Baker Bunny is behind the scenes as she prepares for a fairytale tea party the next day, and you are her special guest! Enjoy the delightful ride through the village on your way to the tea party, and be charmed by the very real setting of this wonderful little book.

HARDCOVER: 8x8x inches. Just the perfect size!

20 colorful photographs tell the story, with a happy ending that will please any young child, (or any adult who is "young at heart"!)

Wonderful COMMENTS-REVIEWS of my BOOK HERE:
http://www.castlesncrowns.net/pages/Comments.htm

Copyright 2013: © CastlesNcrowns, Sweet Rascal Photos, Tricia Sothcott, and ི♥ྀ Tricia The Fairy Godmother ི♥ྀ 2005-present.

AVAILABILITY: 1 IN STOCK

Children's Author Tricia "the Fairy Godmother" currently resides in a pretend castle with a windmill, a wishing well, a jester for a husband, and an imagination full of fantasy and fun.

name: Childrens Picture Book BEACH MYSTERY 8x8 Hardcover
description:
What mystery lies on the shore of this beach? Follow nature and let the author reveal, through real photographs, a curious sight with a magical friend on a special beach walk in this delightful children’s picture book.

BEACH MYSTERY is a children's storybook, a picture book, using photography and rhyming to tell the story. 

SIZE: 8X8 inches. Hardcover with image wrap cover.

20 colorful photographs tell the story, with a happy ending that will please any young child, (or any adult who is "young at heart"!)

Children's Fiction.
